entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:25 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 04:30 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: NNE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening and ending overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023
